node.title: [Podcast] From idea to fundraise
node.html:
I had a lot of fun being interviewed for PursuitPod. We covered:

  • coming up with the idea for Personably
  • speaking to a lot of people about the problem
  • building a scrappy v1
  • working with early adopter companies
  • making revenue from those early adopter companies
  • raising our Â£500K seed round from a VC
  • what you need to think about when raising VC as an early stage company

You can hear the full podcast here on Spotify, Youtube etc.

(awesome illustration by Kate Holden - you can check out more of her work here)
node.meta_description: I had a lot of fun being interviewed for PursuitPod.
